solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--    public boolean isAdditiveNumber(String num) {--newline--        int n = num.length();--newline--        for (int i = 1; i <= n / 2; ++i)--newline--            for (int j = 1; Math.max(j, i) <= n - i - j; ++j)--newline--                if (isValid(i, j, num)) return true;--newline--        return false;--newline--    }--newline--    private boolean isValid(int i, int j, String num) {--newline--        if (num.charAt(0) == '0' && i > 1) return false;--newline--        if (num.charAt(i) == '0' && j > 1) return false;--newline--        String sum;--newline--        Long x1 = Long.parseLong(num.substring(0, i));--newline--        Long x2 = Long.parseLong(num.substring(i, i + j));--newline--        for (int start = i + j; start != num.length(); start += sum.length()) {--newline--            x2 = x2 + x1;--newline--            x1 = x2 - x1;--newline--            sum = x2.toString();--newline--            if (!num.startsWith(sum, start)) return false;--newline--        }--newline--        return true;--newline--    }--newline--}--newline--// Runtime: 3ms
